Text:
Great server, great download speeds, definetly the best pre-tbc server available
Thanks for the upload, will be seeding this

So, how exactly does this thing work? Do we have to pay monthly or anything?
Sorry to be a n00b, but I was just wondering.
Nope, just create a account and start playing. 100% free
Just remember to use "Team Reloaded.exe" to play because of the custom talent patch (makes the 2.4.3 game look like 1.12.1 -> PreTBC)
Keep seeding! :)

I only have one thing to ask....
Does this game have "Campaign mode" or it is only mutiplayer?

I hope it is just like or better than warcraft 3- the frozen throne!
Please.. Reply to my earlier Comment
Only online multiplayer

Hey Harrharrr... I Cannot update Patch!!
What to do?? Where should i update it from? I tried to download it through the game but it stops!!
So do u know any sites where i can get it..Pls send Link.
I also Created an account. Now what?? How is payment process??
RahulZDeadman, what do you want to update it to?
I have installed wow-wrath of the lich king. It has a program called "WoW-3.2.0-enGB-downloader". This is the patch downloader. It Says 1.6 GB!!
I have till now used torrents. I want to create my own. What to do??
i Cannot play!!! It says add a game to your account!! I dont even have a key!! What to do??Please Help!
RahulZDeadman, first of all read the torrent description, visit the webpage it tells you to go to create your account and well.. READ DUDE!

Hey Ionnamun... I created an account and updated all the latest patches...But when i login,, it says "you havent added any game to your account" and for that u need Unique cd key which we can only get by buying original DVD. So... What Now???

RahulZDeadman, this is a private server. It is not related to blizzards official servers in any way. You have to pay to play there.
To play on our server, download the torrent and leave it the way it is. Visit our webpage (pretbc.com), registar an account and login using the account name you used during registration.
If you update the game to the latest version (3.x) then you need another server like magic-wow, and I would recommend you to download another torrent with wrath of the lich king installed so you can enjoy the expansion content.
Awesome server! Very nostalgic.

PLEASE HELP ME! when i klick on team-reloaded.exe it stands "Failed to create WoW process! Is WoWMe in the same directory as WoW.exe?" what is the WoWMe? And it can also say "This version of WoWMe was compiled for version 2.4.2 8278 of WoW!"    Please help me really wanna try this server out:)

If you get any errors after using the Team-Reloaded.exe... force recheck the torrent and resume the torrent. When it completes the rechecked download, you should be error free if you use the Team-Reloaded.exe to connect to pretbc.com's server. Occasionally, it's reported that this error is present, but a recheck of the torrent always fixes it. Hope this helps.
Okay this server is dead and buried, but who knows it might come back one day... so keeping the torrent
